title: Radiohead: From the Basement - on DVD and BluRay
body:
Radiohead's TV performance of The King Of Limbs is now available to buy on DVD and BluRay.

In case you didn't see it, the programme is a live studio performance of The King of Limbs. There are also performances of The Daily Mail and Staircase, which haven't been released yet. Supercollider has been added as a bonus track. Thanks to Steve Keros who took some nice pictures to go in the book.

Orders are being taken now for the DVD & BluRay for Christmas Delivery. If a digital version is all you require, it will be on iTunes from the 19th December. The DVD & BluRay will be in the shops, but probably not until the end of January.
